method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _closepopup
method.comment: Close the popup without result. This will return CLOSE_WITHOUT_RESULT constant in popup result event

method.name: _initialize:::::::
method.comment: Initialize the popup everytime you need a new one Eventname: Sub name that will handle the popup result event [ Eventname_Result(button as string) ] Callback: Set the module in which you want to catch the result event Title: Title of the popup. Leave blank if you dont want. Body: Body text of the popup. Leave blank if you dont want. Buttons: List of button name. You will get this name in result sub Cancelable: Set if it is cancelable by clicking outside of the popup

method.name: _popupwidth
method.comment: Get the popup width (useful for custom popup)

method.name: _resize
method.comment: Call it from Page_Resize event if your application support both orientation

method.name: _setbuttonbackgroundcolor:
method.comment: Set button color Default: Transparent Black

method.name: _setbuttonfont:
method.comment: Set button text font. Default font size is 14

method.name: _setbuttontextcolor:
method.comment: Set button text color Default: Black

method.name: _setcustomview:
method.comment: Set the custom view. Setting custom view will hide Body text, Image and Video properties.

method.name: _setpopupbackgroundcolor:
method.comment: Set the popup background color. Default: white

method.name: _setpopupcornerradius:
method.comment: Set the popup corner radius. Default: 5 Max: 15

method.name: _setpopupimage:
method.comment: Set popup image. If you set popup image then popup video will not work.

method.name: _setpopupvideo:
method.comment: Set popup video url. If you want to load video from non secure url (http) then make sure that ATS is disable.

method.name: _show:
method.comment: Style must be any of the style constant You should set all properties you need before calling this

method.name: _updatepostion:
method.comment: Update the popup position relative to keyboard (only requrired if popup contains input field). Call it from Page_KeyboardStateChanged event

property.name: _buttonbackgroundcolor
property.comment: Set button color Default: Transparent Black

property.name: _buttonfont
property.comment: Set button text font. Default font size is 14

property.name: _buttontextcolor
property.comment: Set button text color Default: Black

property.name: _customview
property.comment: Set the custom view. Setting custom view will hide Body text, Image and Video properties.

property.name: _popupbackgroundcolor
property.comment: Set the popup background color. Default: white

property.name: _popupcornerradius
property.comment: Set the popup corner radius. Default: 5 Max: 15

property.name: _popupimage
property.comment: Set popup image. If you set popup image then popup video will not work.

property.name: _popupvideo
property.comment: Set popup video url. If you want to load video from non secure url (http) then make sure that ATS is disable.
